SELECT b.*,u.name AS assignName FROM business b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id
b.id = #{dto.businessId}
AND b.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.name},'%')
AND b.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.phone},'%')
AND b.status = #{dto.status}
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.assignName},'%')
ORDER BY b.update_time DESC
